page.title: 20A family Christmas Day.
page.content: I couldn't wait for Christmas Day,but I suppose we had to!At last it was seven a.m.and Caroline came into my bedroom,then woke Grandma and Grandad. We got our pillow cases,(we usually hang up stockings but Mum said we could have pillow cases this year), emptied them and out came chocolate coins,books,magazines and things like that from Father Christmas.These we showed to Mum and Dad.After breakfast the family opened their presents.At lunch-time we had turkey and all the trimmings,then Christmas pudding and brandy sauce.We usually listen to the Queen's speech but,because we had lunch late,we missed it.We watched T.V.and played games,had a buffet tea and watched T.V.again before going to bed.We had a happy Christmas Day. Didn't the day go quickly!
